overview: Program Listing 76: Wandering - Johnny Cash Tie A Yellow Ribbon Round The Ole Oak Tree - Tony Orlando, Johnny & June Carter Cash Christmas As I Knew It - Johnny Cash Far Away Places - Johnny Cash & Roy Clark Juke Box Saturday Night - Roy Clark That Lucky Old Sun - Johnny Cash The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You)- Roy Clark Stephen Foster Medley: Camptown Races - Johnny Cash, Roy Clark & Tony Orlando Beautiful Dreamer - Roy Clark Old Folks At Home - Johnny Cash Jeanie With The Light Brown Hair - Tony Orlando Oh!
